solution_line_template: For the humans in the house, there are {num_humans} * {legs_per_human} = <<{num_humans}*{legs_per_human}={human_legs}>>{human_legs} legs
Javier has a total of {num_dogs} + {num_cats} = <<{num_dogs}+{num_cats}={num_pets}>>{num_pets} four-legged pets
For the pets in the house, there are {num_pets} * {legs_per_pet} = <<{num_pets}*{legs_per_pet}={pet_legs}>>{pet_legs} legs
There are a total of {human_legs} + {pet_legs} = <<{human_legs}+{pet_legs}={total_legs}>>{total_legs} legs
